New Records: Georgia booked a place in the last 16 of Euro 2024 with a 2-0 win over Portugal on Wednesday in the biggest upset by FIFA rankings in European Championship history.
Key Match Events: Georgia stunned Portugal with a 2-0 win, securing their place in the last 16 of Euro 2024
Pre-Game Insights: Bernardo Silva: Ronaldo 'doesn't like to lose'
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia interrupt post-game interviews while Tblisi parties after shock win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the VELTINS-Arena in Gelsenkirchen, Germany, with an attendance of 49,616
Others: The match was broadcast on FOX, and Georgia's win marked a significant upset in European Championship history
